errors.error_description: The code example incorrectly updates the model with `learn_one` before making a prediction for the same instance. In online validation (Prequential evaluation), the model should first predict and then learn.
correction_candidates: Swap the `model.learn_one(x, y)` and `y_pred = model.predict_one(x)` lines to predict before training on the instance.
Remove the `metric.update` line as it is computationally expensive inside the loop.
Combine prediction and learning into a single `model.learn_predict_one(x, y)` call.
The `model.learn_one(x, y)` call should come first to ensure the model is initialized before prediction.
errors.golden_answer: Swap the `model.learn_one(x, y)` and `y_pred = model.predict_one(x)` lines to predict before training on the instance.
